newsitem.title: CHINA: China says probes finances of Agriculture Trust.
newsitem.headline: China says probes finances of Agriculture Trust.

text.p: Authorities are investigating the finances of China Agriculture Trust & Investment Development Co, a huge investment entity owned by the Agriculture Ministry, officials of the investment company said on Tuesday.
The ministries of Agriculture and Finance began an investigation into the company's financial situation a year ago, an official of the investment company told Reuters.
"Senior officials are discussing the matter. So far it is hard to say what the conclusion will be," the official said.
He declined to give details of the company's financial problems. He also would not say why the investigation needed so much time or why it had only now been disclosed.
Officials of the ministries of Agriculture and Finance declined to comment.
The company has investments in real estate and securities.
